While parking bank statements the next fields must be obligatory filled-in: date of bank statement, payment Company code, bank name, CTC ID, currency, short summary, APP/ GLP payment type and Vendor name\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Processes of Vendor clearing and Vendor open items checking, in general, are performed altogether.
